name: Idle TD - Epic Strategy Games
description:
Idle TD is a single-tap hyper casual tower defense game that will keep you hooked for hours!

Idle TD is the Ultimate Merge Game
Upgrade your defense cannons by merging them!
Watch as your cannons level up and become powerful defenders, and get exciting new powers to crush bosses and attackers!

Idle TD is the Ultimate Idle Game
Once you've set up your defenses, you can sit back, relax and enjoy your day, knowing that your cannons are working hard to defend your land, but remember to check back often for upgrades, gifts and other rewards!
